messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Help me collect the basic electoral information of 50 U.S. states in 2024. 1) the number of congressional districts; 2) number of electors; 3) the name of the governor in 2024 and his/her party affiliation, like "Gavin Newsom (D)"; 4) the names of the two senators in 2024 and their party affiliations separately.

Please present the information in one Markdown table with these column headers: State, Number of Congressional Districts, Number of Electors, Governor (Party), Senator 1 (Party) & Senator 2 (Party) 

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.

For example, 
```markdown
| State           | Number of Congressional Districts | Number of Electors | Governor (Party)     | Senator 1 (Party)& Senator 2 (Party) |
|-----------------|-----------------------------------|--------------------|----------------------|-------------------|-------------------|
| Alabama         | 7                                 | 9                  | Kay Ivey (R)         | Tommy Tuberville (R)& Katie Britt (R)   |?

<think>
We need to gather data on each state's congressional districts, electors, governors, and senators for 2024. This requires extensive research as current data might not be available for 2024 projections. We'll start by searching for this information.
</think>

<search>2024 U.S. state governors and senators</search>

Search query: 2024 U.S. state governors and senators
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.nga.org/governors/):
Current Governors - National Governors Association The National Governors Association provides informative gubernatorial resources, including current Governors' biographies and terms in office.

[Doc 2](https://ballotpedia.org/States_with_both_gubernatorial_and_U.S._Senate_elections_in_2024):
States with both gubernatorial and U.S. Senate elections in 2024 The incumbent governor and senator were both Democrats in one of these states, Delaware, and in four of them, Utah, Missouri, North Dakota, and West Virginia, ...

[Doc 3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2024_United_States_Senate_elections):
2024 United States Senate elections - Wikipedia Class 1 senators faced election in 2024. Republicans flipped four Democratic-held seats, regaining a Senate majority for the first time in four years, and ...
<search>2024 congressional districts and electors per state</search>

Search query: 2024 congressional districts and electors per state
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2024_United_States_House_of_Representatives_elections):
2024 United States House of Representatives elections - Wikipedia The 2024 United States House of Representatives elections were held on November 5, 2024, to elect the 435 representatives of the United States House of ...

[Doc 2](https://www.archives.gov/electoral-college/allocation):
Distribution of Electoral Votes | National Archives Allocation among the States Electoral votes are allocated among the States based on the Census. Every State is allocated a number of votes equal to the ...

[Doc 3](https://www.politico.com/2024-election/results/house/):
House Election Results 2024: Live Map - Races by State - POLITICO Live 2024 House election results and maps by state. POLITICO's real-time coverage of 2024 races for President, Senate, House and Governor.

Given the above information, it seems we still require more specific details such as exact numbers of districts and electors for each state. Let’s proceed to compile the most accurate data we can find.
</think>

<search>2024 congressional districts by state</search>

Search query: 2024 congressional districts by state
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2024_United_States_House_of_Representatives_elections):
2024 United States House of Representatives elections - Wikipedia ... congressional districts in 30 states while the Democrats won a majority in 18 states. Two states (Colorado and Minnesota) elected a split house delegation.

[Doc 2](https://www.270towin.com/2024-house-election/):
2024 House Election Interactive Map - 270toWin - 270 to Win Who will control the Congress? Review and predict the outcome of the 435 House races in the 2024 election.

[Doc 3](https://www.cnn.com/election/2024/results/house):
House election results 2024 | CNN Politics All 435 seats in the US House of Representatives are up for election. See real-time results and maps for the 2024 House races.

Search query: 2024 electoral college by state
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.archives.gov/electoral-college/2024):
2024 Electoral College Results - National Archives Check back for the Certificates of Vote from the 2024 election. They will be posted as they become available. President Donald J. Trump [R] Main Opponent ...

[Doc 2](https://www.archives.gov/electoral-college/allocation):
Distribution of Electoral Votes | National Archives Allocation among the States Electoral votes are allocated among the States based on the Census. Every State is allocated a number of votes equal to the ...

[Doc 3](https://www.cnn.com/election/2024/results/president):
Presidential election results 2024 | CNN Politics View maps and real-time results for the 2024 US presidential election matchup between former President Donald Trump and Vice President Kamala Harris.
